<P STYLE="MARGIN:18PT 0PT 0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Our Competitive Strengths
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	We believe the following strengths can provide us with a significant competitive advantage in implementing our business strategy:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Executive Team Track Record.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Our senior executive team has a long, proven track record, with over 80&nbsp;years of combined experience in the wireless telecommunications and dispatch radio industry. They are considered to be leaders in the industry and led the creation of the first all-digital nationwide wireless network that brought PTT to the mass business and consumer markets. Brian McAuley and Morgan O&#x2019;Brien, our Chairman and Vice Chairman, respectively, were the co-founders of Nextel. While Mr.&nbsp;O&#x2019;Brien remained on the board at Nextel, Mr.&nbsp;McAuley, after serving as Nextel&#x2019;s President and Chief Executive Officer for seven years, went on to found NeoWorld Communications in 1999. NeoWorld was subsequently purchased by Nextel in 2003. In addition, several members of our current management team held leadership roles at Nextel, including our President and Chief Executive Officer, John Pescatore, Leon Frazier, our Chief Sales and Marketing Officer,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	T
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	imothy G
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	ray, our Chief Financial Officer, Robert Schwartz, our Chief Strategy and Development Officer, and Thomas Sidman, our Chief Legal Officer
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	. We believe the combined strength of our executive team provides us with a significant competitive advantage
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	to both develop our business as a private carrier dedicated to businesses and critical infrastructure entities and pursue additional spectrum initiatives
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	. &nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Dedicated
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	PTT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Network.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	We believe our ability to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	offer
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	a dedicated
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	PTT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	network to our targeted dispatch-centric
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	business
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	customers in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	major
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	markets throughout the United States will be a significant competitive advantage. Although the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Tier 1 cellular carriers
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	offer
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	some form of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	PTT service
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	, these PTT s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	ervices
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	are super-imposed on a network designed primarily for telephony and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	d
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	ata-based services. As a result,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	there can be
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	many short-comings
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	, including
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	latency
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	(
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	or delay
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	issues, as well as
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	decreased
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	quality
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	of service
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	impaired
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	functionality and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	reduced
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	overall ease of use.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	O
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	ur
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	PTT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	network solution, which
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	is dedicated to dispatch, restores
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	the speed, simplicity and reliability demanded by our targeted dispatch-centric customers and enhance
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	their communications within their organizations and with their suppliers, vendors and customers.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Integrated
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Mobile Resource Management Solution.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Our DispatchPlus service bundle
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	our pdvConnect mobile resource management solution with a dedicated
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	PTT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	network and customer handsets and devices designed for dispatch and PTT communications
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	. This service
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	enable
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	quick
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	communication and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	response among workers in the field and streamlined dispatch operations through faster exchanges of information by prioritizing messages from the field, which can reduce or eliminate wasteful &#x201C;on hold time
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	.&#x201D;&nbsp;&nbsp;Because pdvConnect is a cloud-based service offering, there is no software on the subscriber device, which makes it easier for our customers to deploy and to begin utilizing pdvConnect.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Attractive Pricing Model.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	We believe
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	our DispatchPlus service offers
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	significant value
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	our dispatch-focused customers
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	and arguably greater value than our competitors&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	PTT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	offerings. We offer our solution at a monthly price that is significantly lower than the monthly fees currently charged by Tier 1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	cellular
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	carriers
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	for their
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	PTT with comparable mobile resource management solutions
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	. While SMR dispatch providers may offer their solutions at competitive prices, we believe our DispatchPlus service provide
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	two significant
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	value
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	advantages
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	over our SMR competitors
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	: (i)&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	we have the ability to offer
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	greater coverage given our nationwide spectrum position and (ii)&nbsp;our service include
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	our proprietary pdvConnect solution,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	only some features of which can be obtained on local SMR networks through separate purchases from multiple third-party application providers
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	. &nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Lower Deployment Costs
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	. We
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	are deploying our PTT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	network using
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	high-site, high-power
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	digital network
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	architecture
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	developed by Motorola.&nbsp;&nbsp;This technology allows us to provide services to major market areas with
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	, &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	on average,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	10 to 12 sites per market, as compared to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	hundreds of sites required by the low-site, low-power architectures that many of our
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Tier 1 carrier competitors
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	utilize. We believe this
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	technology-based coverage advantage
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	will drive significantly lower
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	deployment costs and ongoing operating and maintenance expenses
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	versus
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	our
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Tier 1 carrier
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	competitor
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	s.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	In addition, given the amount of &#x201C;prime&#x201D; (below 1 GHz) spectrum we acquired and particularly the price at which we acquired it, we believe our cost for spectrum is considerably less than recent industry transactions.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Also, because our
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	pdvConnect
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	solution
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	becomes
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	integrated with
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	business
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	operations of our customers
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	our
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	customer
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	s elect to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	make an investment in the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	PTT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	equipment
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	we offer
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	when they select our solution,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	our customer
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	churn rate
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	can be
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	lower than the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	customer
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	churn rate experienced by Tier 1 carriers
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;This lower customer churn rate can help to reduce our overall customer acquisition costs and to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	driv
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	e
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	a more predictable revenue stream.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Strategic Relationships.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	We have long-standing relationships with customers, vendors and wireless industry leaders. We have entered into a reseller agreement with Motorola,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	under
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	which Motorola
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	is
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	provid
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	ing
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	us with its state-of-the-art
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	digital technology
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	for our
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	PTT network and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	mobile
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	handsets and devices we offer
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	to our
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	customers.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	We also agreed to purchase equipment manufactured by Motorola for any future broadband network we deploy, provided that Motorola makes reasonable efforts to ensure the equipment meets our required sourcing criteria.&nbsp;&nbsp;Further, we are
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	leverag
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	ing
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Motorola&#x2019;s nationwide dealer network, which we believe consists of over 750 dealers nationwide in more than 1,500 locations,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	as the primary channel to sell our DispatchPlus service.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Coupled with the support of our internal sales and marketing programs, w
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	e believe this
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	approach
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	will enable us to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	establish a presence in our markets and help to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	reduce the upfront cost
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	of establishing a nationwide sales and distribution network.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	In addition
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	to our arrangements and relationship with Motorola,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	we believe our long-standing relationships with our customers and wireless industry leaders will help us
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	build
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	our dispatch
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	business and pursue our spectrum initiatives
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	. &nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:18PT 0PT 0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
</P>

</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT SOLID #000000 ;TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">

<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage10"></A>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<A HREF="#PDVW-20160331X10K_HTM_TABLEOFCONTENTS">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Table of Contents
</FONT>
</A>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:18PT 0PT 0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Our Business Strategy
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	We intend to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	pursue the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	following
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	business
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	strategies
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	to build our business and to enhance the long-term value of the Company
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	: &nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Deploy Our PTT Network
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	We are a licensee of nationwide spectrum in the 900 MHz band.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp; &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	We intend to establish
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	our PTT network in major markets throughout
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	the United States. Within these markets, we intend to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	offer our DispatchPlus service
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	to our targeted dispatch-centric
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	business
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	customers
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	As the only nationwide licensee focused
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	solely
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	on the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	PTT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	dispatch
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	business
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	, we have the opportunity to offer strong dispatch-only coverage
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	throughout
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	the United States, which will allow us to serve businesses with a presence in more than one local market. In addition,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	over time,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	we believe this national presence
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	can
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	provide us with both
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	scale and leverage that
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	our
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	existing local SMR competitors may have difficulty achieving. We
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	commenced service in seven major metropolitan market areas, including Houston, Dallas, Atlanta, Philadelphia, Chicago, the greater New York area and Baltimore/Washington.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Provide a Differentiated
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	PTT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Service.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Following Sprint&#x2019;s decision to de-commission
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	the legacy Nextel
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	iDEN network in June 2013, we believe a compelling opportunity to provide a differentiated PTT service has emerged.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp; &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	DispatchPlus, comprised of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	our proprietary pdvConnect mobile communication and resource management solutions and Motorola&#x2019;s PTT digital technology network architecture and mobile devices, provides our customers with instant
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	PTT communication
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	abilities combined with a holistic workforce management solution
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	DispatchPlus
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	offers the speed, simplicity, reliability and efficiency our dispatch-centric customers demand, and provides them with the opportunity to achieve greater workplace efficiency and return on investment than existing competitive PTT offerings.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Acquire and Retain the Most Valuable Customers.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	We intend to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	continue to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	focus on acquiring and retaining the most valuable
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	business
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	customers spanning industry verticals that have historically been dispatch-centric. These verticals include construction, distribution, transportation, field services, waste management and hospitality. Given the potential advantages of our
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	DispatchPlus
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	service over current PTT and dispatch solutions, we believe that we have the opportunity to gain market share as our customers choose our solution for a variety of factors, including price, quality of service, functionality, reliability and ease of use. In addition, because our solution is integrated with a customer&#x2019;s business processes and the customer makes an investment in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	user
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	equipment when they select our solution, we believe that the churn rate of our target customers
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	can
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	be significantly lower than the churn rate experienced by Tier 1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	cellular
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	carriers,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	which can help us to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	driv
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	e
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	a more predictable revenue stream.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Leverage our Established Industry Relationships.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Due to our executive team&#x2019;s long, proven track record, we have significant market expertise and established industry relationships. We have significant relationships with wireless industry leaders
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	, vendors
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	and PTT operators. We intend to leverage these relationships in order to provide us with both a strategic and operational advantage. In addition, we intend to leverage our existing relationships to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	continue to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	hire and retain experienced and successful sales, operating, and technology personnel. We have entered into a reseller agreement with Motorola, who
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	is providing
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	us with
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	the di
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	gital
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	t
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	echnology that we
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	are using
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	for our
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	PTT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	network and for the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	mobile
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	handsets and devices we offer to our customers. We also
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	are
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	utiliz
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	ing
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Motorola&#x2019;s existing dealer network
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	as the principal channel to sell our DispatchPlus service in our existing launched markets.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Strategically Expand
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Service Offerings
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	and Enhance Geographic Market Presence.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Once we have successfully entered
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	and demonstrated acceptable levels of sales productivity and financial performance in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	our initial
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	major
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	markets, we intend to further expand and enhance our geographic market presence into
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	other attractive market areas.&nbsp;&nbsp;That expansion may be
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	through a variety of means, including deploying our own
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	PTT network
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	, leasing
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	spectrum and/or through joint ventures
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;We are also evaluating the potential to leverage our network deployments and spectrum to expand our solutions beyond voice dispatch.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Increase the Value of Our Spectrum.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	We are now the largest holder of FCC licenses in the 900 MHz band, with a nationwide footprint in the contiguous United States, plus Hawaii, Alaska and Puerto Rico.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	We hold, on average, approximately 60% of the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	total number of 900 MHz SMR and B/ILT licensed channels i
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	n the top 20 metropolita
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	n markets in the United States.&nbsp;&nbsp;W
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	e anticipate
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	demand for high speed data and video services, even in the case of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	our targeted
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	PTT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	customers
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	, &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	will
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	provide an impetus for change
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	to expanded service offerings, including broadband technologies,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	over the longer term.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;Accordingly,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	November 2014
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	we and the Enterprise Wireless Alliance submitted a Joint Petition for Rulemaking to the FCC to propose realignment of a portion of the 900 MHz spectru
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	m from narrowband to broadband. In addition to this regulatory action, we are also pursuing a number of broadband spectrum initiatives.&nbsp;&nbsp;We
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	believe
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	past
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	experience and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	successes
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	of our management team
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	, combined with our anticipated market position as a leading private dispatch carrier,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	will
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	provide us with the opportunity to increase the value of our spectrum
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	and allow us to pursue additional spectrum
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	opportunities.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:18PT 0PT 0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
</P>
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT SOLID #000000 ;TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Page
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	8
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">

</HR>
<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage11"></A>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<A HREF="#PDVW-20160331X10K_HTM_TABLEOFCONTENTS">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Table of Contents
</FONT>
</A>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:18PT 0PT 0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Our
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	PTT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Network and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Mobile Device Offerings
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Our
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	PTT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Network.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp; &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Motorola has developed and designed the state-of-the-art digital technology we are utilizing for our PTT network.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	For over 80 years, Motorola has set the standard for dispatch radio and PTT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	network technology.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Motorola digital technology
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	we are utilizing
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	puts PTT at the core of functionality
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	, i
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	n contrast to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	existing
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	cellular technologies, such as the former iDEN network
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;In addition, the Motorola digital technology
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	network architecture
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	is
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	not
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	based on the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	low-elevation, low-power, multi-site configurations
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	used for cellular technologies, which can require
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	hundreds
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	of cell sites in a general market or metropolitan area. Instead, the architecture of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	the Motorola d
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	igital
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	t
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	echnology is high-site, high-power
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	, &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	with
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	a limited number of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	sites
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	required
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	in a general market or metropolitan area to provide on-street coverage. As a result,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	this technology platform and related siting approach allow us to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	deploy our
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	PTT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	network on
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	a limited number of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	sites in a metropolitan area
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	(on average, 10 to 12 sites per major metropolitan area) when
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	compared to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	the far greater number of sites we would be required to deploy if we relied on
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	cellular technologies
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	and network design approaches
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	. Our network
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	is
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	also be
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	ing
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	designed
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	and deployed
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	for optimum PTT performance
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	and functionality, and will support both
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	one-to-one
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	and one-to-many communications.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Finally, because the Motorola
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	d
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	igital
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	t
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	echnology is
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	already a commercially
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	proven technology, our
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	PTT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	network deployment is not subject to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	typical
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	developmental risk or supply delays.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Our PTT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Devices.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	The mobile handsets and vehicle-mounted devices we offer to our customers are also built to incorporate the Motorola
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	d
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	igital
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	t
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	echnology.&nbsp;&nbsp;These devices provide the functionality to allow &#x201C;one button&#x201D; PTT communications.&nbsp;&nbsp;In addition, these devices are larger, more powerful, and more &#x201C;ruggedized&#x201D; than typical cell phones and/or smartphones.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	We also include pdvConnect, our
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	proprietary
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	mobile resource
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	management solution, with the DispatchPlus service.&nbsp;&nbsp;Since it is a cloud-based solution, our customers are not required to download any additional software before using the features offered by pdvConnect.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:18PT 0PT 0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Our DispatchPlus Services
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	For our
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	targeted set of dispatch-centric small and medium-sized business customers, we offer our DispatchPlus service.&nbsp;&nbsp;DispatchPlus, utilizing Motorola&#x2019;s state-of-the-art digital PTT technology, provides our targeted customers with the voice quality and dependability they demand.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	In addition to providing PTT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	functionality
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	, DispatchPlus include
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	our
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	proprietary
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	pdvConnect mobile
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	communication and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	resource management solution. This proprietary service offering is designed to give customers the ability to instantly set up PTT communications &#x2013; either privately (one-to-one) or with a group (one-to-many) &#x2013; within their calling area with just the touch of a &#x201C;button.&#x201D; In addition, pdvConnect
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	can
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	help companies increase productivity through the delivery of real-time information from mobile workers to dispatch operators, incl
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	uding Global Positioning System
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	(
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#x201C;GPS&#x201D;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	tracking and real time location, worker status, activity repo
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	rting and field event logging.&nbsp;&nbsp;p
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	dvConnect can also integrate with corporate intranets and back-office systems, such as sales force automation, order entry, inventory tracking and customer relationship management.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	We intend to continually seek to enhance pdvConnect and our future wireless business solutions to meet the demands of our customers based on their industry and individualized business needs, including a wide array of fleet and workforce management services that utilize the capabilities of our data network, such as the ability to accurately and in real time locate handsets using GPS technology. We also back our services with an enterprise-grade, dedicated customer support team.

<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<A HREF="#PDVW-20160331X10K_HTM_TABLEOFCONTENTS">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Table of Contents
</FONT>
</A>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:18PT 0PT 0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Our Sales and Marketing Strategy
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	We
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	target our DispatchPlus service for
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	small and medium-sized businesses with fewer than 1,000 employees
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	that operate in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	industry verticals that, given the nature of their business and their asset and human resource profile, have historically been dispatch-centric. These verticals include construction, distribution, transportation, field services, waste management and hospitality. We believe our DispatchPlus service
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	can
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	provide these businesses with the instant communication
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	services
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	they need, and, coupled with our pre-packaged pdvConnect
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	communication and resource
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	management solution, the speed and simplicity they need to operate efficiently. We offer our services on a no-contract basis, with services billed on a monthly basis
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	We are
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	establish
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	ing
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	our
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	PTT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	dispatch network in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	major markets
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	throughout the United States.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;We have commenced service in the following seven major metropolitan areas during fiscal 2016, including Houston, Dallas, Atlanta, Philadelphia, Chicago, the greater New York area, and Baltimore/Washington.&nbsp;&nbsp;The criteria we use for selecting
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	markets
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	as well as the order of our network rollout
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	is
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	based on a number of factors, including:
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	the overall population size of the market, the number of dispatch-centric businesses in the market, the cost and effort required to establish our network in the market, the existing competition in the market and the strength of our
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	sales representatives
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	in the market.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	We primarily offer our DispatchPlus service to customers indirectly through third-party sales representatives.&nbsp;&nbsp;We are currently selecting our sales representatives from Motorola&#x2019;s nationwide dealer network, which we believe consists of over 750 dealers nationwide in more than 1,500 locations, and from select third-party wireless dealers.&nbsp;&nbsp;We support our indirect sales representatives by providing them with training, sales, marketing and advertising support from our internal sales and marketing team.&nbsp;&nbsp;We also support our indirect sales representatives by placing a PDV dealer manager in each market in which we operate.&nbsp;&nbsp;In addition, we are evaluating and implementing a number of sales initiatives, including multiple types of lead generation programs and hiring additional sales resources. We believe this approach of utilizing existing wireless dealers, to serve as our indirect sales representatives, coupled with our direct sales and marketing efforts and initiatives, will enable us to establish a presence in our markets and help to reduce the upfront costs of establishing a nationwide sales and distribution network.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	To date, sales of our DispatchPlus service have been slower to ramp-up than our initial expectations for a number of reasons, including but not limited to,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	the performance of our indirect
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	third-party sales representatives, longer initial sales cycle, and coverage gaps in certain markets due to delays in our deployment of planned sites that were not or have not yet been completed.&nbsp;&nbsp;On the positive front, our sales prospects are growing and initial feedback from early customers and prospects indicates strong interest in our DispatchPlus service offering.&nbsp;&nbsp;Further, we are currently focusing our resources on the seven markets where we have commenced service.&nbsp;&nbsp;That focus includes trialing and implementing a number of sales and marketing initiatives and strategies aimed at increasing sales of our DispatchPlus service and developing a predictable sales funnel and process.&nbsp;&nbsp;These initiatives include:
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:36PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:36PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 18.00PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT;FONT-FAMILY:SYMBOL;FONT-SIZE:8PT;;">
	&#xB7;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Identifying and targeting high-value, small and medium-sized business customers that we believe will benefit from our
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	DispatchPlus
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	service;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:36PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:36PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 18.00PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT;FONT-FAMILY:SYMBOL;FONT-SIZE:8PT;;">
	&#xB7;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Focusing
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	our advertising and marketing efforts on communicating the benefits of our services to business customers in our targeted market verticals;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">

<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT;">

</FONT>

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Beginning
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	to develop alternate sales channel strategies and identifying new sources of sales and leads in our targeted market verticals.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	We intend to continue to focus our efforts on the initial seven markets
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	where
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	we have commenced service until we prove
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	out
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	our DispatchPlus business model in those markets.&nbsp;&nbsp;We have continued to prepare for the rollout of our DispatchPlus service in more than thirteen additional markets by completing initial network designs and in some markets pursuing site development efforts, including site selection and lease negotiation.&nbsp;&nbsp;This approach will allow us to more quickly and effectively proceed with new market deployments when we determine it is best to do so.&nbsp;&nbsp;We also believe this approach will provide us with additional time and financial flexibility to refine our longer term strategies including those related to our Joint Petition.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:18PT 0PT 0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
