<A NAME="eolPage13"></A>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<A HREF="#PDVW-20160331X10K_HTM_TABLEOFCONTENTS">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Table of Contents
</FONT>
</A>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:18PT 0PT 0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Our Competition
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	T
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	he market for wireless and dispatch
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	communication
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	services has been and will continue to be characterized by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	intense
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	competition on the basis of price,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	performance, technology advances and the features, functionality, quality and reliability of the offered s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	ervices and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	products.&nbsp;&nbsp;With respect to our DispatchPlus service, we
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	compete with a number of wireless Tier 1 carriers
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;Most
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	of these competitors
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	offer some form of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	PTT service
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	, along with a selection of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	mobile resource management solutions
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	In addition to the Tier 1 carriers, we also compete with local SMR and other dispatch service providers
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	who offer PTT services to our targeted dispatch-centric business
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	market verticals.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	With respect to our broadband and other spectrum initiatives, we compete with the Tier 1 carriers, local SMR operators and other public and private companies that are in the business of acquiring and developing spectrum assets.&nbsp;&nbsp;In addition, our joint petition is opposed by certain incumbents and other third parties with conflicting business interests.&nbsp;&nbsp;Many of the t
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	hird parties who
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	are not
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	supportive of our broadband initiative or with whom we compete against for spectrum opportunities may have more resources, and greater political and regulatory influence, than we do
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:18PT 0PT 0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Our Relationship with Sprint Corporation
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	I
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	n May
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	2014, we entered into an Asset Purchase Agreement with certain wholly-owned subsidiaries of Sprint (the &#x201C;Sprint APA&#x201D;) to acquire: (i)&nbsp;FCC licenses to operate a nationwide dispatch network in the 900 MHz band and (ii)&nbsp;certain 900 MHz equipment. We
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	paid
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Sprint an aggregate of $100 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	for these assets
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	, consisting of $90 million in cash and $10&nbsp;million in shares of our common stock at a price equal to $20.00 per share.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	In September 2014, we obtained the necessary approvals from the FCC to transfer the FCC licenses from Sprint to the Company, and we completed the closing of the purchase and sales of the spectrum assets (the &#x201C;Spectrum Closing&#x201D;).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:18PT 0PT 0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Our Relationship with Motorola
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	We signed a reseller agreement with Motorola pursuant to which we agreed to purchase, and Motorola agreed to supply us with,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	the Motorola digital technology we are utilizing to deploy our PTT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	network
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	and the mobile handsets and devices we are offering to our customers
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp; &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Additionally, Motorola invested $10 million in our subsidiary, PDV Spectrum Holding Company, LLC, that we formed to hold
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	our
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	900 MHz spectrum
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	licenses.&nbsp;&nbsp;Motorola&#x2019;s ownership interest
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	our
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	subsidiary is convertible into shares of our common stock at a price equal to $20.00 per share. Motorola is not entitled to any profits
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	, dividends
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	or other distribution from the operations of our subsidiary.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	In addition, we entered into a lease agreement with Motorola in which our subsidiary agreed to lease a portion of our 900 MHz licenses in exchange for an upfront, fully-paid lease fee of $7.5 million. Under the terms of this lease agreement with Motorola, Motorola can use the leased channels to provide narrowband services to certain qualified end-users. The end-users can only use the leased channels for their own internal communication purposes. The end-users cannot sublease the channels to any other end-users or to any commercial radio system operations or carriers. The lease agreement specifically states that the channels leased to Motorola will not be used in a manner that would be competitive with our services and limits the total number of channels that Motorola can lease in any market area. The lease agreement provides us with flexibility regarding the future use and management of our spectrum, including setting forth relocation and repurposing policies for or affecting the leased channels.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Motorola cannot enter contracts with end-users after December&nbsp;31, 2020 without our consent and the payment of an additional fee. The initial lease period for any end-user cannot last more than seven years, and the lease can only be renewed for up to three years for an aggregate lease period of up to 10 years.&nbsp;&nbsp;In addition, we agreed to purchase equipment manufactured by Motorola for any future broadband network we deploy, provided that Motorola makes reasonable efforts to ensure the equipment meets our required sourcing criteria.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:18PT 0PT 0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Our
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Intellectual Property
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	To establish and protect our proprietary technologies and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	service offerings
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	, we rely on a combination of patent, copyright, trademark and trade-secret laws, as well as confidentiality provisions in our contracts. We implemented a patent strategy designed to protect our technology and facilitate the commercialization of our
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	service
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	offerings. Currently, our patent portfolio is comprised of s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	even
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	issued U.S. patents, two issued European patents
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	two
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	issued Canadian patent
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	s,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	all of which have been assigned to and are owned by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	us
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	. In addition, we have several trademarks and service marks to protect our
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	corporate name, services offerings,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	goodwill and brand. There are
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	currently
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	no claims or litigation regarding
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	these
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	trademarks, patents, copyrights, or service marks. We also rely on trade-secret protection of our intellectual property. We enter into confidentiality agreements with third parties, employees and consultants when appropriate.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:18PT 0PT 0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
</P>
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT SOLID #000000 ;TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Page
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	11
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
</HR>
<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage14"></A>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<A HREF="#PDVW-20160331X10K_HTM_TABLEOFCONTENTS">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Table of Contents
</FONT>
</A>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:18PT 0PT 0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	The
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Regulation
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	of Our Business
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	We hold
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	FCC spectrum
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	licenses
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	in the 900 MHz band
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	as a non-interconnected, non-common carrier SMR service provider, and are subject to regulation as a Private Mobile Radio Service (&#x201C;PMRS&#x201D;) licensee by the FCC. The FCC regulates the licensing, construction, operation and acquisition of our wireless operations and wireless spectrum holdings in the United States.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp; &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Within the limitations of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	their
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	spectrum
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	holdings
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	available
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	technology, PMRS operators are authorized by the FCC to provide non-interconnected mobile communications services, including two-way radio dispatch (sometimes referred to as walkie-talkie), and mobile data and internet services.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Licensing
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	As a PMRS licensee,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	we
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	are required to provide our wireless communication
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	services
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	on
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	specified spectrum frequencies within specified geographic areas and must comply with the rules
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	, regulations
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	and policies adopted by the FCC. The FCC issues each
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	spectrum
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	license for a fixed period of time, typically 10 years in the case of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	the FCC
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	licenses
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	we currently hold
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	. While the FCC has generally renewed licenses
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	held by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	operating companies like us, the FCC has authority to both revoke a license for cause an
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	d to deny a license renewal if it determines that a license
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	renewal is not in the public interest. Furthermore, we could be subject to fines, forfeitures and other penalties for failure to comply with FCC regulations, even if any such non-compliance
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	is
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	unintentional. The loss of any licenses, or any related fines or forfeitures, could adversely affect our business, results of operations
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	financial condition.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	The Communications Act of 1934, as amended, and FCC rules
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	and regulations
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	require
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	us to obtain
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	the FCC&#x2019;s prior approval
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	before assigning
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	or transfer
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	ring
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	control of wireless licenses, with limited exceptions.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;The FCC&#x2019;s rules and regulations also govern spectrum lease arrangements for a range of wireless radio service licenses, including the licenses we hold. These same requirements apply to any licenses or leases we may wish to acquire as part of our broadband initiatives.&nbsp;&nbsp;T
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	he FCC may prohibit or impose conditions on
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	any proposed acquisitions, sales or other
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	transfers of control of licenses
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	or leases
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	. The FCC engages in a case-by-case review of transactions that involve the consolidation
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	or sale
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	of spectrum licenses or leases and may apply a spectrum &#x201C;screen&#x201D; in examining such transactions. Because an FCC license is necessary to lawfully provide wireless service, if the FCC were to disapprove any such
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	request to acquire, assign or otherwise transfer a license or lease,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	our business plans would be adversely affected. Approval from the Federal Trade Commission and the Department of Justice, as well as state or local regulatory authorities, also may be required if we sell or acquire spectrum.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	900 MHz Band Spectrum Reconfiguration
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	FCC approval
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	will be
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	required to allow repurposing of 900 MHz spectrum
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	from narrowband
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	broadband and to allow the realignment of the 900
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	MHz
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	spectrum so that it
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	is capable of supporting
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	LTE
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	technology consistent with our long-range broadband initiatives
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	. A decision by the FCC declining to permit the needed spectrum repurposing
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	and subsequent realignment activities
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	could have a significant
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	adverse
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	effect on
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	the value of our spectrum and on
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	our future plans for provision of broadband services.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	FCC Regulations
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	The FCC does not currently regulate rates for services offered by PMRS providers.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;However, w
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	e may be subject to other FCC regulations that impose obligations on wireless providers, such as federal Universal Service Fund obligations, which require communications providers to contribute to a fund that supports subsidized communications services to underserved areas and users; rules governing billing, subscriber privacy and customer proprietary network information; roaming obligations; rules that require wireless service providers to configure their networks to facilitate electronic surveillance by law enforcement officials; rules governing spam, telemarketing and truth-in-billing; and rules requiring us to offer equipment and services that are accessible to and usable by persons with disabilities, among others. There are also pending proceedings that may affect spectrum aggregation limits and/or adjustment of the FCC&#x2019;s case-by-case spectrum screens; regulation surrounding the deployment of advanced wireless broadband infrastructure; the imposition of text-to-911 capabilities; and the transition to IP networks, among others. Some of these requirements and pending proceedings (of which the foregoing examples are not an exhaustive list) pose technical and operational challenges to which we, and the industry as a whole, have not yet developed clear solutions. We are unable to predict how these pending or future FCC proceedings may affect our business, financial condition or results of operations. Our failure to comply with any applicable FCC regulations could subject us to significant fines or forfeitures.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	State and Local Regulation.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	In addition to FCC regulation, we
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	are
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	subject to certain state regulatory requirements. The Communications Act of 1934, as amended, preempts state and local regulation of the entry of, or the rates charged by, any PMRS provider. State and local governments are permitted to manage public rights of way and can require fair and reasonable compensation from wireless providers for use of those rights of way so long as the compensation required is publicly disclosed by the government. The siting of base stations also remains subject to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	some degree of control by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	state and local jurisdiction. States also may impose competitively neutral requirements that, among other things, are necessary for universal service or to defray the costs of state E911 services programs, to protect the public safety and welfare, and to safeguard the rights of customers.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
</P>
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT SOLID #000000 ;TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Page
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	12
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
</HR>
<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage15"></A>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<A HREF="#PDVW-20160331X10K_HTM_TABLEOFCONTENTS">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Table of Contents
</FONT>
</A>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Tower Siting
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	In connection with deploying and operating our PTT network
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	, we may be required to comply with various federal, state and local regulations that govern the siting, lighting and construction of transmitter towers and antennas, including requirements imposed by the FCC and the Federal Aviation Administration. FCC rules subject certain tower site locations to extensive zoning, environmental and historic preservation requirements and mandate consultation with various parties, including State and Tribal Historic Preservation Offices, which can make it more difficult and expensive to deploy facilities. The FCC has, however, imposed a tower siting &#x201C;shot clock&#x201D; that requires local authorities to address tower applications within a specific timeframe, which can assist carriers in more rapid deployment of towers. The FCC antenna structure registration process also imposes public notice requirements when plans are made for construction of, or modification to, antenna structures required to be registered with the FCC, potentially adding to the delays and burdens associated with tower siting, including potential challenges from special interest groups. To the extent governmental agencies continue to impose additional requirements like this on the tower siting process, the time and cost to construct towers could be negatively impacted.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Motor Vehicle Restrictions.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	A number of states and localities have banned or are considering banning or restricting the use of wireless
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	handsets and devices
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	while driving a motor vehicle, which in many instances
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	could
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	include the use of PTT devices. Such bans could cause a decline in the number of minutes of use by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	business customers
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	or make our service less attractive to certain potential subscribers.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Electronic Surveillance.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	We may be required by law to provide certain surveillance capabilities to law enforcement agencies. If required, we intend to deliver the requisite surveillance capabilities to law enforcement with respect to our PTT service.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	National Security
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	National security and disaster recovery issues continue to receive attention at the federal, state and local levels. For example, Congress is expected to again consider cyber security legislation to increase the security and resiliency of the nation&#x2019;s digital infrastructure. In 2013, the President issued an executive order directing the Department of Homeland Security and other government agencies to take a number of steps to improve the security of the nation&#x2019;s critical infrastructure. The details surrounding the implementation of this order have not been resolved, however, and we cannot predict the cost impact of such measures. Moreover, the FCC continues to examine issues of network resiliency and reliability and may seek to impose additional regulations designed to reduce the severity and length of disruptions in communications.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:18PT 0PT 0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Our
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Employees
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	As of March&nbsp;31, 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	6
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	, we had
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	8
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;f
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	ull-time employees. None of our employees are covered by a collective bargaining agreement
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;W
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	e believe that our relationship with our employees is positive.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:18PT 0PT 0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Our
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Corporate Information
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Our principal executive offices are located at 3 Garret Mountain Plaza, Suite 401, Woodland Park, New Jersey 07424. Our main telephone number is (973)&nbsp;771-0300.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;We were originally incorporated in California in 1997, and reincorporated in Delaware in 2014.&nbsp;&nbsp;In November 2015, we changed our name from Pacific DataVision, Inc., to pdvWireless, Inc.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Our internet website is
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	www.pdvwireless.com
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	. We do not incorporate the information on or accessible through our website into this Annual Report, and you should not consider any information on, or that can be accessed through, our websi
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	te a part of this Annual Report
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	. &nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:18PT 0PT 0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Available Information
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	We file with, or furnish to, the Securities and Exchange Commission (&#x201C;SEC&#x201D;) annual reports on Form 10-K, quarterly reports on Form 10-Q, current reports on Form 8-K, as well as various other information. Investors may access, free of charge, through the Investor Relations portion of the website, our annual report on Form 10-K, quarterly reports on Form 10-Q, current reports on Form 8-K, and amendments to such reports filed or furnished pursuant to Section&nbsp;13(a) or 15(d) of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, as amended (the &#x201C;Exchange Act&#x201D;) as soon as reasonably practical after such material is filed electronically with the SEC. The public may read and copy any materials we file with the SEC at the SEC&#x2019;s Public Reference Room at 100 F Street, NE, Washington D.C. 20549. The public may obtain information on the operation of the Reference Room by calling the SEC at 1-800-732-0330. The public may also view electronic filings of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	pdvWireless
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	, Inc. by accessing SEC filings at
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	http://www.sec.gov
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	. &nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">

	&nbsp;

</P>
<EFX_RISK_FACTORS>
<A NAME="FIS_RISK_FACTORS"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	ITE
</FONT>

</A>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	M&nbsp;1A.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	RISK FACTORS
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	You should carefully consider the following risk factors, together with the other information contained in this Annual Report and our other reports and filings
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	made with the SEC
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	in evaluating our business and prospects. If any of the risks discussed in this Annual Report occur, our business, prospects, liquidity, financial condition and results of operations could be materially and adversely affected, in which case the trading price of our common stock could decline significantly. Some statements in this Annual Report, including statements in the following risk factors, constitute forward-looking statements. Please refer to the section entitled &#x201C;Cautionary Statement Concerning Forward-Looking Statements.&#x201D;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:18PT 0PT 0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Risks Related to Our Business
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	We have a limited history with respect to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	the implementation of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	our principal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	PTT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	business
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	plans
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	and with the spectrum realignment efforts we are pursuing with the FCC,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	which makes it difficult to evaluate our prospects and future financial results, and our business
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	activities, strategic approaches and plans
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	may not be successful.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Although we were incorporated in 1997, our business model and strategy changed significantly
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	following
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	our acquisition of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	900 MHz spectrum licenses in September 2014.&nbsp;&nbsp;Following this acquisition, we have commenced deploying PTT networks in major metropolitan markets in the United States and pursuing an FCC rulemaking process aimed at realigning our spectrum from narrowband to broadband
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	. As a result,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	ability to forecast our future operating results is limited and subject to a number of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	risks and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	uncertainties, including our ability to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	accurately forecast
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	estimate
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	our future
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	revenue
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	growth and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	expenses
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	of deploying our PTT networks and pursuing our broadband spectrum initiatives
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	. We have encountered
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	and expect to continue to encounter
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	risks and uncertainties frequently experienced by new businesses in highly competitive and technical markets. If our assumptions regarding these
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	risks and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	uncertainties are incorrect or change in reaction to changes in our markets,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	in our FCC rulemaking process, in our business plans or opportunities, in PTT or other communications technologies, in economic conditions,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	or if we do not manage or address these risks
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	and uncertainties
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	successfully, our results of operations could differ materially
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	and adversely
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	from our expectations
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	As a new and unproven business, any future success will depend, in large part, on our ability to, among other things:
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>

</P>

	&#xB7;

</P>
</TD>

<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	buildout
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	our
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	PTT
</FONT>

	dispatch-centric network
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">

</FONT>

	;
</FONT>
</P>

</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 18.00PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT;FONT-FAMILY:SYMBOL;FONT-SIZE:8PT;;">

</P>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	scale
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	our internal business operations in an efficient and cost-effective manner.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Any failure to achieve one or more of these objectives could adversely affect our business, our results of operations and our financial condition.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:18PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#000000;">
	We have had net losses each year since our inception, and may not achieve or maintain profitability in the future.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	We have incurred net losses each year since our inception, including net losses of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	$21,827,967,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	$14,714,168,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	$1,211,821 in the fiscal years ended March&nbsp;31,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	2016, 2015 and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	2014, respectively. We
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	expect to continue to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	incur significant
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	net
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	losses in the future for a number of reasons, including without limitation the risks and uncertainties described in this Annual Report related to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	the deployment of our PTT networks, the commercialization of our DispatchPlus service
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	the pursuit of our broadband spectrum initiatives
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp; &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Additionally, we may encounter unforeseen operating expenses, difficulties, complications, delays and other unknown factors that may result in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	levels of revenue below our current expectations, or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	losses
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	or expenses that exceed our current expectations.&nbsp;&nbsp;If our
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	losses
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	or expenses
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	exceed our expectations or our revenue growth
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	assumptions
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	are not met in future periods,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	we may never achieve or maintain profitability in the future.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:18PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
</P>
<P>

	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:18PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	We rely on the selling efforts of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	third-party sales representatives
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	, such as Motorola
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	&#x2019;s dealer network
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	, and if
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	these
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	parties
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	do not perform
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	our
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	business
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	will be adversely affected.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	We primarily offer our DispatchPlus service
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	to customers indirectly through third-party sales representatives
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	selected
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	from Motor
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	ola&#x2019;s nationwide dealer network and from other select third-party wireless dealers
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;To date, sales of our DispatchPlus service have been slower to ramp-up than our initial expectations for a number of reasons, including but not limited to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	the performance of our indirect third-party sales representatives, longer initial sales cycle, and coverage gaps in certain markets due to delays in our deployment of planned sites that were not or have not yet been completed.&nbsp;&nbsp;We may not be successful in incentivizing our third-party sales representatives to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	promote our
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	DispatchPlus
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	services
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	at the levels necessary to grow our business.&nbsp;&nbsp;Moreover, our third-party sales representatives
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	may receive better incentives from our competitors
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	or other service providers.&nbsp;&nbsp;In addition, the efforts and programs we implement, including our sales training, lead generation and marketing and advertising initiatives, may not be successful in increasing sales through our third-party sales representatives.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	The failure by these parties to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	meet our sales expectations,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	or to effectively promote our DispatchPlus services, will a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	dversely affect our business and our results of operations.&nbsp;&nbsp;In addition, if our indirect sales channel fails to perform satisfactorily, we may be required to hire a direct sales force or otherwise increase our spending on initiatives to support our indirect sales channel, which would
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	impose significant addit
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	ional costs on us and could
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	adversely affect our operations
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	and financial condition
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	. &nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:18PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	We rely on Motorola to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	design, develop and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	supply
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	our PTT network
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	equipment
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	and mobile handsets and devices.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Motorola has developed and designed
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	digital technology and equipment we are utilizing for our PTT network and the mobile handsets and devices we offer to our DispatchPlus customers.&nbsp;&nbsp;In addition, we have entered into agreements with Motorola in which we have agreed to purchase our existing and future network equipment and the mobile handsets and devices we offer to our customers from Motorola, subject to certain terms and conditions.&nbsp;&nbsp;As a result, our business is substantially dependent on Motorola&#x2019;s ability and willingness to deliver high-quality network equipment and mobile handsets and devices in the quantities and on the time frames we require for our existing and future business.&nbsp;&nbsp;Our business and operations would be negatively impacted by any failure by Motorola to meet our design, development and supply requirements.&nbsp;&nbsp;Moreover, Motorola is
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	also
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	a &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	significant supplier of wireless communications equipment
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	and devices
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	to our competitors.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Motorola
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	may elect to focus a greater amount of their financial and other resources on the development of enhanced features
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	and improved functionality for the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	wireless
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	networks and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	equipment used by our competitors
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	or on developing alternative technologies,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	rather than
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	the network,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	equipment
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	and technology
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	used by us.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	In such an event, we might be forced to supply our customers with
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	services,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	equipment
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	or devices
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	that
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	are
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	either more costly or qualitatively inferior to the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	services,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	equipment
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	or technologies
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	offered by our competitors
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;As a result, our arrangements with Motorola may
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	reduce our operational flexibility
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	may delay or prevent us from employing new or different technologies that perform better or are available at a lower cost
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	because of the additional economic costs and other impediments to change generally
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	as well as those that arise under
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	our
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	agreements
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	with Motorola
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	. In the event that Motorola or another one of our suppliers i
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	s unable to deliver the network equipment and the mobile devices and handsets
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	required by our existing and future
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	operations, we may not be able to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	deploy our existing and future networks and offer services to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	our c
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	ustomer
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	s on a timely basis
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	and with the competitive features, functionality and costs our business requires, any of which would adversely affect
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	our
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	future
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	growth
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	and our results of operations
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	. &nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:18PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	We may not be able to successfully operate our
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	PTT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	business.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Our PTT networks and our DispatchPlus service
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	target a very specific niche
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	of potential customers within
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	the existing market for wireless communications services. The subset of the market
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	we are targeting with
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	our
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	PTT networks and our DispatchPlus
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	service may not prove to be as
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	large or as easy to convert from other competitive service offerings
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	as we
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	initially
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	estimate
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	d
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;For example, we have experienced slower customer growth than we initially anticipated in the seven markets in which we have deployed our PTT networks.&nbsp;&nbsp;Because of this, we have implemented a number of sales, marketing and advertising initiatives and programs to increase sales in these markets and to supplement our indirect sales network.&nbsp;&nbsp;Additionally, we have elected to delay the deployment of our PTT networks in additional markets until we have had time to evaluate these new initiatives and programs and assessed our ability to operate a profitable PTT business.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Moreover, we cannot assure you that
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	past experience
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	of our management team
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	will be sufficient to enable us to successfully
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	deploy and operate our DispatchPlus business.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Furthermore,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	our sales, marketing and advertising strategies and initiatives
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	may not
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	increase our revenues or allow us to increase our revenues at a pace that will enable us
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	to pay our operating expenses or service
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	any
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	indebtedness
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	we may incur
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	As a result, we cannot assure you that we can grow our PTT business at a rate sufficient to a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	chieve
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	maintain profitability
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:18PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
</P>
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT SOLID #000000 ;TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">

	Page
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">

</HR>
<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage18"></A>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<A HREF="#PDVW-20160331X10K_HTM_TABLEOFCONTENTS">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Table of Contents
</FONT>
</A>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:18PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	The wireless communications industry is highly competitive, and in order for us to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	build a successful business
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	we will need to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	convert customers to our DispatchPlus service from the services offered by our competitors.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	There are currently
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	a number of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	national wireless communications services providers
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	, including certain Tier 1 carriers, and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	local two-way SMR radio operators
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	that offer
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	two-way PTT dispatch services.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	We believe that a significant majority of our targeted DispatchPlus customers will be existing users of the PTT services offered by our competitors and may be difficult to attract away from the services offered by our competitors
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;We have always expected, and we continue to believe, that to build a successful PTT business we will need to convert customers to our DispatchPlus service from the services offered by our competitors.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	In order for us to compete effectively, we will need to demonstrate the superiority of our service
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	offerings,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	may be required to offer competitive or discounted prices in order to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	convert
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	our targeted
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	customers from
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	services
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	they are receiving from our competitors.&nbsp;&nbsp;In addition, our targeted
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	customers
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	operate in different industry verticals, and as a result,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	we will need to tailor our
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	sales and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	marketing approach to many different categories of customers. If we are unable
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	to convert customers to our DispatchPlus service from the services they are receiving from our competitors
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	, our ability to grow our
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	DispatchPlus
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	business and our operating results will suffer.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:18PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Many
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	of our competitors are financially stronger
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	and have more resources
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	than we
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	do
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	, which may limit our ability to compete
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	with their service and product offerings and their spectrum initiatives
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	. &nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Because of their resources and, in some cases, ownership by larger companies,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	many
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	of our competitors are financially stronger
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	and have more resources
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	than we
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	do
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	, which may enable them to offer services
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	and products to our
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	t
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	argeted
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	customers at prices that are below the prices at which we can offer comparable services
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	or products
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;In addition, these competitors may be able to use their greater
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	resources to build networks and offer devices that are more robust, provide higher quality operation or offer enhanced features and functionality than the services and products we can offer to our targeted customers.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	If we cannot compete effectively based on the price
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	, quality and functionality
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	of our service
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	and product
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	offerings, our revenues and growth may be adversely affected.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Additionally, national wireless communications service providers that offer cellular phone services that do not incorporate a PTT function
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	, or that incorporate a PTT function that we consider inferior to our own in important areas,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	often provide customers with free or significantly discounted or subsidized handsets as an enticement to sign up for their particular suite of services
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	, which can include services in addition to those offered by us
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	. &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	In contrast, our customers typically purchase mobile handsets or devices from us or our dealers in order to utilize our DispatchPlus service.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	The cost of the handsets that we offer
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	our customers, as compared to cellular
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	handsets that do not incorporate a PTT dispatch-centric, multi-function capability
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	similar to that which is provided in our handsets
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	, may make it more difficult or less profitable for us to attract customers. Moreover, the cost of our handsets combined with the offering of free handsets by some wireless communications services providers
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	may
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	require
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	us to adopt subsidy programs that would cause
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	us to absorb part of the cost of offering our handsets to new and existing customers. These increased costs for our target
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	ed
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	customers to acquire handsets for use on our
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	PTT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	network
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	and any handset subsidy expenses we may need to absorb to offset a portion of these increased costs may reduce our growth and profitability.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Further, with respect to our spectrum initiatives, we compete with the Tier 1 carriers, local SMR operators and other public and private companies that are in the business of acquiring and developing spectrum assets.&nbsp;&nbsp;In addition, our broadband spectrum initiatives may be opposed by incumbents and other third parties with conflicting business interests.&nbsp;&nbsp;Many of the t
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	hird parties who
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	are not
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	supportive of our broadband initiatives or with whom we compete against for spectrum opportunities may have more resources, and greater political and regulatory influence, than we do
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	, which could prevent, delay or increase the cost of any spectrum initiatives.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:18PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	If other wireless vendors or service providers improve their existing PTT dispatch services
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	or we fail to keep pace with rapid technological changes, we may not be able to attract or retain our targeted customers.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	A number of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Tier 1 carriers
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	already offer or plan to offer wireless equipment that is capable of providing PTT services or technologies that compete or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	could
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	compete with our
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	PTT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	service and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	product
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	offerings.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	In addition, a number of third parties have developed mobile communication and workforce management applications that offer comparable functionality to pdvConnect, our suite of mobile resource management applications included with our DispatchPlus service.&nbsp;&nbsp;Moreover, f
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	uture technological advancements may occur quickly and may render our
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	services or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	technology obsolete
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	enable other wireless technologies
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	to offer services or functionalities that are
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	equal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	better than those available in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	our
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	PTT offerings
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp; &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	In addition, competition among the differing wireless communications technologies could:
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:36PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:36PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 18.00PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT;FONT-FAMILY:SYMBOL;FONT-SIZE:8PT;;">
	&#xB7;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	further
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	segment
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	industry
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	markets
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	in which our target customers operate
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	, which could reduce the demand for, and competitiveness of, our
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	services and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	technology; and
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:36PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:36PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 18.00PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT;FONT-FAMILY:SYMBOL;FONT-SIZE:8PT;;">
	&#xB7;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	reduce
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	the resources devoted by third party suppliers, such as Motorola, to developing or improving the technology for our
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	network and PTT offerings
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	If the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	services
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	, &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	technologies
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	or applications offered by our competitors
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	are perceived to be or become, or if any such services
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	, technologies or applications
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	introduced in the future are,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	largely
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	comparable
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	or superior
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	PTT service
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s, technologies or applications we offer, we may not be able to attract or retain sufficient numbers of our targeted customers or grow
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	our business.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
</P>
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT SOLID #000000 ;TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">

<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage19"></A>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<A HREF="#PDVW-20160331X10K_HTM_TABLEOFCONTENTS">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Table of Contents
</FONT>
</A>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Moreover, the largest national wireless communications service providers by revenue
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	, including the Tier 1 carriers,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	do not currently focus on PTT dispatch services as a primary component of their businesses. However, if that were to change, it would likely be difficult for us to compete effectively with such providers. These larger service providers have larger existing customer bases that they will be able to introduce PTT dispatch services to, have more money to spend on research and development that may enable them to create
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	services and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	products that are qualitatively superior to ours
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	, have the ability to conduct nationwide sales and marketing campaigns
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	and may have the ability to operate successfully on a smaller profit per
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	user
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	margin due to the larger volume of customers they service.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:18PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	If our customers do not renew their services with us, our future
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	growth
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	and operating results will be harmed.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	We do not require our customers to enter into long-term contracts (unlike most of our local SMR system operator competitors) for our DispatchPlus service.&nbsp;&nbsp;As a result, our business
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	strategy depends on building and maintaining a loyal customer base
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;Our ability to retain customers depends on a number of factors, including our ability to continue to offer our customers high-quality, robust and cost-effective services, the effectiveness of our customer support, the budgeted amounts that our targeted customers are prepared to devote to obtaining their mobile communications solutions and the service and product offerings of our competitors.&nbsp;&nbsp;In addition, we may lose customers
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	if we do not develop new solutions, features and functionality that meet
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	their evolving needs.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Given our limited operating history
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	in our recently launched DispatchPlus business
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	, we are unable to accurately predict our customer
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	renewal rates.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	If our customers do not renew their services with us, our future growth and operating results will be harmed.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:18PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	We may face pressure to reduce
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	our per user
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	pric
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	es for our DispatchPlus service, which could adversely affect our
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	operating results.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Our
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	competitors may decrease prices or increase
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	the features and functionality of their
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	service and product offerings
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	at an existing price
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	, &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	which could require us to reduce the per user price for our DisptachPlus service
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	. Competition in pricing and service and product offerings may also adversely impact
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	our
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	customer retention
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	and churn rate
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	. We may encounter market pressures to:
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:36PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:36PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 18.00PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT;FONT-FAMILY:SYMBOL;FONT-SIZE:8PT;;">
	&#xB7;

</P>

</P>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	migrate
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	existing customers to lower priced service offering packages;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>

<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">

</P>

<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 18.00PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT;">

<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:36PT;">
