<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	On October 23, 2015, the Company entered into a promissory note in the amount of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	$1,289,013
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	with a third party in exchange for wireless licenses.&nbsp;&nbsp;The term of the note is through March 15, 2018 and bears a fixed rate of interest, of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	0.55%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	per ann
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	um, which is based on the Short-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Term Applicable Federal Rate on the closing date.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	For the year ended
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	March 31, 2016, the Company had
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	repaid
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	$297,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	203
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	in principal.&nbsp;&nbsp;The outstanding
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	borrowings of the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	promissory note was
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	$991,810
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	as of March 31, 2016.
</FONT>
</P>

</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	The
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	C
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	ompany has deferred tax assets of approximately
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	$
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	2
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	0.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	2
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	million and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	$
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	14.7
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	million relating to these net operating loss carryforwards and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	stock based
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	compensation
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	expense
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	at March&nbsp;31, 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	6
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	and 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	, respectively. Federal net operating loss carryforwards are subject to limitations as a result of the change in ownership (see
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	N
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	ote 1) as defined under Internal Revenue Code Section&nbsp;382. State net operating loss carryforwards are subject to limitations which differ from federal law in that they may not allow the carryback of net operating losses, and have shorter carryforward periods. Due to the uncertainty with respect to the realization of these deferred tax assets the company recorded a valuation allowance for the entire amount. The difference between the tax benefit at the statutory rate and the effective tax rate is attributable to a full valuation allowance placed upon the deferred tax asset.
</FONT>

<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">

<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	The
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	C
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	ompany established the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	p
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	dvWireless
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	2014 Stock Plan (the &#x201C;2014 Stock Plan&#x201D;) to attract, retain and reward individuals who contribute to the growth and profitability of the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	C
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	ompany. This
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	2014
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Stock Plan superseded previous stock plans although under such previous plans,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	51,512
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	stock options were
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	outstanding and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	51,028
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	stock options
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	were
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	vested as of March&nbsp;31, 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	6
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	. &nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	The
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	C
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	ompany&#x2019;s Board of Directors
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	has
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	reserved
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	2,538,234
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	shares of common stock for issuance under its 2014 Stock Plan
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	as of March 31, 2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	. The number of shares will continue to automatically increase each
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	January 1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:5PT;VERTICAL-ALIGN:SUPER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%">
	st
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	through January&nbsp;1, 2024 by an amount equal to the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	lesser
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	(i)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	5%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	of the number of shares of common stock issued and outstanding on the immediately preceding December&nbsp;31 or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	(ii)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	a lesser amount determined by the Board of Directors.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	F
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	or the year ended March 31, 2016,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	C
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	ompany awarded certain employees of the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	C
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	ompany
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	274,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	options to purchase shares of common stock with a weighted average exercise price of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	$
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	33.70
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	per share. The shares have a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	ten
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	year contractual life and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	25%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	will vest on the first anniversary of grant, and the remainder will vest in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	three
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	equal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	annual
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	installments. Shares granted to employees are subject to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	accelerated vesting
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	and other such terms as determined by the Board of Directors.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	On January 13, 2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	, the Company awarded an executive officer
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	an option to purchase
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	50,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	shares of common stock with an exercise price of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	$25.81
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	that vest
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	immediately
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	upon meeting certain performance conditions
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	and have a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	ten
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	year contractual life
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	In connection with the June 2014 Private Placement, the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	C
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	ompany converted all outstanding shares of the company&#x2019;s Series AA Preferred Stock into
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	748,722
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	shares of its common stock, exchanged
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	661,581
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	outstanding warrants to purchase shares of Series AA Preferred Stock into
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	29,809
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	shares of common stock, and converted the remaining options and warrants to purchase shares of the Series AA Preferred Stock into options or warrants to purchase shares of the common stock, and converted restricted stock units for shares of the company&#x2019;s Series AA Preferred Stock into restricted stock units for shares of common stock.
</FONT>
</P>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	The
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	C
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	ompany recognizes compensation expense for restricted stock
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	on a straight line basis
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	over the explicit vesting period. Vested restricted stock units are settled and issuable upon the earlier of the date the employee ceases to be an employee of the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	C
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	ompany o
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	r a date certain in the future.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Stock compensation expense related to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	restricted stock was
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	approximately
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	$33
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	0
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	00
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	for the year ended March 31, 2016 and for
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	83,804
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	shares issued in the year ended March&nbsp;31, 2015 was
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	$1,676,080
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	. &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Stock compensation expense for restricted stock is accounted for in general and administrative expense in the Company&#x2019;s Consolidated Statement of Operations.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	At March&nbsp;31, 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	6
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	, &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	there was
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	$3.4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	million of unvested compensation expense of the restricted stock, which is expected to be recognized over a weighted average period of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	3.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	6
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	years.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Performance Stock
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Units
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	During the year ended
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	March 31, 2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	, the Company awarded
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	37,295
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	performance stock units
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	under the 2014 Stock Plan
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	. These performance stock units represent
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	number of shares of the Company&#x2019;s common stock that the recipient would receive upon the Company&#x2019;s attainment of the applicable
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	performance goal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	. The
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	units will vest in full upon attainment of the performance goals.&nbsp;&nbsp;Performance is based upon achievement, prior to January 13, 2020,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	(A)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	a Final Order
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	f
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	rom the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	FCC
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	providing for the creation and allocation of licenses for spectrum in the 900 MHz band consisting of paired blocks of contiguous spectrum, each containing at least 3 MHz of contiguous spectrum, authorized for broadband wireless communications uses and (B) the lack of objection by the Company's Board of Directors to the terms and conditions&nbsp;&nbsp;(including, but not limited to, the rebanding, clearing and relocation procedures, license assignment and award mechanisms, and technical and operational rules) set forth or referenced in the Final Order.
</FONT>
</P>

<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="WIDTH:02.88%;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;HEIGHT:3.00PT;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;HEIGHT:3.00PT;OVERFLOW: HIDDEN;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="WIDTH:12.70%;BORDER-TOP:2PT DOUBLE #000000 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;HEIGHT:3.00PT;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;HEIGHT:3.00PT;OVERFLOW: HIDDEN;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="WIDTH:02.88%;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;HEIGHT:3.00PT;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;HEIGHT:3.00PT;OVERFLOW: HIDDEN;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="WIDTH:03.36%;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;HEIGHT:3.00PT;PADDING:0PT;">

<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="WIDTH:01.86%;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;HEIGHT:3.00PT;PADDING:0PT;">

	&nbsp;
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	The fair value of options granted is estimated on the date of grant using the Black-Scholes option valuation model. This stock-based compensation expense valuation model requires the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	C
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	ompany to make assumptions and judgments regarding the variables used in the calculation. These variables include the expected term, the expected volatility of the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	C
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	ompany&#x2019;s common stock, expected risk-free interest rate, forfeiture rate and expected dividends. The
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	C
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	ompany calculates it expected term and volatility from the historical volatilities and terms of selected comparable public companies within its industry
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	along with the Company&#x2019;s short history regarding these variables.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	The risk-free interest rate is based on the U.S. Treasury yield curve in effect at the time of grant for periods corresponding with the expected life of the option. The
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	C
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	ompany estimates its forfeiture rate based on an analysis of its actual forfeitures and will continue to evaluate the appropriateness of the forfeiture rate based on actual forfeiture experience, analysis of employee turnover and other factors. The
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	C
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	ompany has never paid, and does not anticipate paying, any cash dividends in the foreseeable future, and therefore uses an expected dividend yield of zero in the option-pricing model.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 1PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:1PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	The following assumptions were used to calculate the fair value of options:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:1PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Performance Stock Options
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	During the year ended
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	March 31, 2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	, &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	the Company awarded an executive officer
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	an option to purchase
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	50,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	shares of common stock
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	with
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	an exercise price of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	$25.81
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	that vest
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	immediately
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	upon meeting certain performance conditions
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;These options h
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	ave a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	ten
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	year contractual life.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	The
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	performance options
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	will vest in full upon attainment of the performance goals.&nbsp;&nbsp;Performance is based upon achievement, prior to January 13, 2020,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	(A)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	a Final Order
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	f
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	rom the FCC providing for the creation and allocation of licenses for spectrum in the 900 MHz band consisting of paired blocks of contiguous spectrum, each containing at least 3 MHz of contiguous spectrum, authorized for broadband wireless communications uses and (B) the lack of objection by the Company's Board of Directors to the terms and conditions&nbsp;&nbsp;(including, but not limited to, the rebanding, clearing and relocation procedures, license assignment and award mechanisms, and technical and operational rules) set forth or referenced in the Final Order.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#xFEFF;

</P>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Motorola Investment
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	On September&nbsp;15, 2014, Motorola invested
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	$10.0
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	million to purchase
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	500,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Class&nbsp;B Units of the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	C
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	ompany&#x2019;s subsidiary, PDV Spectrum Holding Company, LLC (at a price equal to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	$20.00
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	per unit). The C
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	ompany owns
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	100%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	of the Class&nbsp;A Units in this subsidiary. Motorola has the right at any time to convert its 500,000 Class&nbsp;B Units into
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	500,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	shares of the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Company&#x2019;s common stock. The C
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	ompany also has the right to force Motorola&#x2019;s conversion into shares of its common stock on the occurrence of certain corporate events or at its election after September&nbsp;15, 2016. Motorola is not entitled to any assets, profits or distributions from the operations of the subsidiary. In addition, Motorola&#x2019;s conversion ratio from Class B Units to shares of the Company&#x2019;s common stock is fixed on a one-for-one basis, and is not dependent on the performance or valuation of either the company or the subsidiary. The Class&nbsp;B Units have no redemption or call provisions and can only be converted into shares of the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	C
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	ompany&#x2019;s common stock. Management has determined that this investment does not meet the criteria for temporary equity or non-controlling interest due to the limited rights that Motorola has as a holder of Class B Units, and accordingly has presented this investment as part of its permanent equity within Additional Paid-in Capital in the accompanying financial statements.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;

	in

<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:36PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:36PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 18.00PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT;FONT-FAMILY:SYMBOL;FONT-SIZE:8PT;;">
	&#xB7;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	In
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	connection
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	with the Sprint APA,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	500,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	shares of common stock valued at
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	$10.0
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	million was issued as part of the Spectrum Asset purchase.
</FONT>
</P>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">

</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	13.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	Commitments and contingencies
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#000000;">
	Leasing Obligations
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	The
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	C
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	ompany is obligated under certain lease agreements for office space
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	whose
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	leases expire
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	on various dates from
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	June 30, 2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	through
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	May&nbsp;31, 2020
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	. Rent expense amounted to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	$
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	1,057,443
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	for the year ended March 31, 2016, of which
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	$
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	684,277
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	was classified as cost of revenue and the remainder of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	$373,16
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	6
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	was classified in operating expenses in the Consolidated Statements of Operations.&nbsp;&nbsp;The total rent expense of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	$155,531
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	$113,920
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	for the years ended March&nbsp;31, 2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	2014
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	, respectively, was classified as
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	o
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	perating expenses in the Consolidated Statements of Operations.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	The
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	C
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	ompany entered into multiple lease agreements for tower
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	site locations
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	related to the new DispatchPlus business. The lease expiration dates range from
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	February&nbsp;28, 2020
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	March 31, 2026
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	The straight-line method is used to recognize minimum rent expense under leases which provide for varying rents over their term. The effect of applying the straight-line basis resulted in an increase in rental expense of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	approximately
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	$
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	420
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	for the year ended March 31, 2016.&nbsp;&nbsp;For the year ended March 31, 2015, the impact of the straight-line basis resulted in an increase of approximately
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	$24,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	and approximately
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	$17,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	decrease in rental expense for
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	the year ended March&nbsp;31, 2014
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	At March&nbsp;31, 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	6
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	, accumulated deferred rent payable amounted to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	$450,9
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	0
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	and is included as part of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Other liabilities
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	in the accompanying March&nbsp;31, 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	6 Consolidated Balance Sheet.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>

</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Severance Plan Participation Agreement
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	On March&nbsp;27, 2015, the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	C
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	ompany entered into a Severance Plan Participation Agreement (the &#x201C;Participation Agreement&#x201D;) with the its executive officers and certain key employees pursuant to our Executive Severance Plan (the &#x201C;Severance Plan&#x201D;) approved by the compensation committee of the board of directors. The Severance Plan establishes the amount of severance payments and benefits available in the event of a (i)&nbsp;termination of employment by the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	C
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	ompany without Cause or by the participant for Good Reason and (ii)&nbsp;termination of employment by the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	C
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	ompany without Cause or by the participant for Good Reason
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	6
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	months before or within
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	24
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	months after a Change in Control (as defined in the Severance Plan).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	The Severance Plan establishes three tiers of executives: Tier 1, Tier 2 and Tier 3. Within each tier the Severance Plan stipulates the payments due each employee, the effect of equity awards granted, and the provisions for health insurance.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Litigation
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	The C
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	ompany is not involved in any legal proceedings or other legal matters at this time. However, from time to time, the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	C
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	ompany may be involved in litigation that arises from the ordinary operations of the business, such as contractual or employment disputes or other general actions.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Concentrations of Credit Risk
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Financial instruments which potentially expose the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	C
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	ompany to concentrations of credit risk, consist primarily of cash and trade accounts receivable.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	The
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	C
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	ompany places its cash and temporary cash investments with financial institutions for which credit loss is not anticipated.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	The C
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	ompany sells its
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	pdvConnect
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	product and extends credit predominately to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	two third-party carriers. The C
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	ompany maintains allowances for doubtful accounts based on factors surrounding the write-off history, historical trends, and other information.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>

	ccounts receivable, respectively.

<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">

<P STYLE="WIDTH:18PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 18.00PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;">

	a)

</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	all significant deficiencies and material weaknesses in the design or operation of internal control over financial reporting which are reasonably likely to adversely affect the registrant&#x2019;s ability to record, process, summarize and report financial information; and
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">

<TD STYLE="WIDTH:18PT;">

</P>

<P STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;;">
	b)
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	any fraud, whether or not material, that involves management or other employees who have a significant role in the registrant&#x2019;s internal control over financial reporting.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

<A NAME="PDVW-20160331XEX32_1_HTM__GOBACK">

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Exhibit 32.1

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">

<EFX_CERTIFICATION>
<A NAME="FIS_CERTIFICATION_3"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	CERTIFICATION PURSUANT TO 18 U.S.C. SECTION 1350,
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	AS ADOPTED PURSUANT TO
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	SECTION 906 OF THE SARBANES-OXLEY ACT OF 2002
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:24.5PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	In connection with the annual report of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	pdvWireless,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;Inc. (the &#x201C;Company&#x201D;) on Form&nbsp;10-K for the period ended March&nbsp;31, 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	6
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	as filed with the Securities and Exchange Commission on the date hereof (the &#x201C;Report&#x201D;),&nbsp;we, John
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	C.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Pescatore, President and Chief Executive Officer of the Company, and Timothy Gray, Chief Financial Officer of the Company, certify, pursuant to 18 U.S.C. Section&nbsp;1350, as adopted pursuant to Section&nbsp;906 of the Sarbanes-Oxley Act of 2002, that:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:24.5PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	(1) The Report fully complies with the requirements of Section&nbsp;13(a) or 15(d), as applicable of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, as amended; and
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:24.5PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	(2) The information contained in the Report fairly presents, in all material respects, the financial condition and results of operations of the Company.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
